x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement:
In many organizations, employees often face challenges related to parking management. Common issues include difficulty finding available parking spaces, confusion about assigned parking slots, and the inability to easily request changes or report problems with parking facilities.
On the other hand, the management team struggles to efficiently allocate parking slots, track occupancy, and handle employee requests in a systematic way. The current manual or semi-digital processes often lead to delays, miscommunication, and inefficient use of available parking resources.
These challenges create frustration among employees, increase administrative workload, and reduce overall operational efficiency within the organization.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

Service Catalogs
We will create service catalogs for employees to request new parking slots or change their existing parking assignments.

Record Producers
We will use record producers specifically for raising parking-related issues, so employees can quickly report problems through the Service Portal or Mobile Portal.

Custom Tables
Custom tables will store all relevant data, including parking slots, employee assignments, request history, and issue tracking.

Notifications
Notifications will be configured to alert employees and management about request status, approvals, or any changes in real time.

Automated Flows
Flows will be designed using Flow Designer to automate the entire process, including approvals, slot allocation, and notifications, minimizing manual effort.

Reports and Dashboards
Reports and dashboards will provide management with real-time insights into parking utilization, pending requests, and overall system performance, enabling data-driven decisions.

Mobile Portal
The solution will also support a mobile portal, so employees can conveniently submit requests, check slot availability, and track their requests from anywhere.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

ServiceNow Platform
The solution depends on a ServiceNow instance with access to the necessary modules like Service Portal, Flow Designer, and Reporting.

Custom Tables and Data Schema
Proper creation and configuration of custom tables to store parking slots, employee assignments, request history, and issue tracking are required.

Record Producers and Service Catalogs
The solution relies on Service Catalogs and Record Producers being correctly configured to handle requests and issues.

Notifications
Email or in-platform notification configurations must be set up for real-time alerts to employees and management.

User Roles and Access Control
Appropriate user roles, permissions, and access control rules must be defined to ensure employees and management can access the portal and perform their tasks securely.

Mobile Portal
If mobile access is required, the Service Portal must be optimized for mobile devices, including responsive design and mobile-friendly layouts.

Flow Designer Dependencies
Automation flows rely on correctly configured triggers, approvals, and notifications; any missing dependency can disrupt the automated process.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Ensuring accurate and up-to-date data for parking slots and employee assignments.

Designing flows and automation that handle all possible request scenarios without errors.

Configuring notifications to reach the right users at the right time.

Managing user roles and access controls securely and correctly.

Optimizing the Service Portal and Mobile Portal for smooth and user-friendly experience.

Integrating reporting and dashboards to provide meaningful insights without performance issues.
